thread.title: Watch This Matador Lose His Eye During a Bullfight
thread.title_full: Watch This Matador Lose His Eye During a Bullfight

author: jnosek1
title: Watch This Matador Lose His Eye During a Bullfight
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Bullfighting is a sport that's been romanticized for its grace and gore for decades. Today, we focus on the latter quality, due to an incident in Spain that cost bullfighter Juan Jose Padilla his glass eye. Padilla has been known as "The Pirate" ever since he lost his real eye during a fight in 2011. Amazingly enough, he decided to keep on fighting despite the injury, and has donned an eye patch ever since. 
However, that patch was unfortunately not enough to save his replacement eye during his latest match-up. Here's what happens when you take on a raging bull and lose. Be warned, this video is pretty intense: Advertisement
